title: The way forward for MPs is clear - reject the Letwin amendment, pass the deal and get Brexit done
text:
MPs who vote down this wrecking amendment will be thanked profusely by a country desperate to move on

In 2016, the British people voted to leave the European Union – a brave and noble decision, and a characteristically plucky gesture of self-belief by my fellow countrymen and women. Our politicians promised to respect the outcome. David Cameron resigned. Theresa May was installed and what followed were three of the most tumultuous years in British politics since the Second World War.

Politicians who promised to honour the referendum result went back on their word. Ordinary British people were insulted and ignored. The Remain Establishment – gung-ho and out of control in the vacuum created by...
